Author: Greer#0666
Content:
I'm trying to build on alpine.  Looks like zcash made some changes to the source a couple of years ago to make it possible.  With komodo I'm getting an issue with librustzcash.  cargo cannot be found and there is no option to build without-rust as there was in zcash.
Has anyone managed to build in alpine?

Content: no i gave up with alpine.  not much advantage compared to ubuntu

Content: debian:buster-slim did the trick üëç

Author: Bongistan#2965
Content: can I pass the asset chain parameter

Author: Bongistan#2965
Content: into the komodod config file?

Author: Bongistan#2965
Content:
cat coin.conf
addnode=144.76.94.38
addnode=178.63.69.164
addnode=5.9.102.210
addnode=5.9.122.241
addnode=78.47.196.146
addnode=88.198.65.74
addnode=89.248.166.91
port=13001
rpcallowip=127.0.0.1
rpcpassword=set-a-password
rpcport=13000
rpcuser=coinrpc
txindex=1
ac_name=BONGO
ac_supply=9999
ac_sapling=555555555555
